Title: Blindsided
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Tonya Kong (story editor), Sarah Streicher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jay Ali
Plot: While Matt infiltrates a prison to find information on the Albanians, Fisk puts Dex in his crosshairs and a fed-up Foggy goes on the offensive.
